basics.name: Ian Wright
basics.label: Data Analyst
basics.summary: I am a data analyst expecting to graduate with an MS in Data Analytics in the fall of 2023. As a former math teacher, I really value opportunities to tell stories and make meaning of complex metrics and models for non-technical audiences.

courses: Minors in Math and Politcal Science

highlights: Developed an automated task tracking system using Google Sheets formulas and scripts which enabled an innovative self-paced classroom model using ed tech and blended learning
Consistent year over year student test score growth of 50 points in math (double that of peer teachers in the network
Measured and tracked student data in Tableau and Excel to differentiate and adapt instruction

work.summary: Presented SAT curricula to diverse audiences and settings
highlights: Responded to student data to adapt curriculum and drive 36 points of student test score growth
Maintained relationships with various Chicago public and private schools as clients
Supported students in content areas ranging from 6th grade math to GRE prep and MBA level Economics
Partnered with local non-profits such as the YMCA, and the Upward Bound Programs and University of Wisconsin--Milwaukee and Robert Morris University
Managed a team of 15 volunteers to provide matched tutoring to high school students in math
Tracked volunteer and student metrics using Excel formulas and pivot table functions
